name: Userstyles.org Forum - Bright, blue, sky
description: by grom. Bright, blue, sky-themed style, refreshing the look of Userstyles.org Forums. Recommended with style 79899.
additional_info: Dark version - style 65356. Rest of the series: style 59996 style 79899 style 63610 Latest changes (2015-02-21): fixed some small input fields. (2015-01-31): search term highlighting. (2014-09-27): further fixes for the new forum. (2014-09-22): updated for the new forum. (2013-12-24): minor tweaks to header and tabs. (2013-11-29): red line separating unread from read posts; smaller header and logo. Credits: Sky texture image [*] licensed CC-BY-2.0 by Patrick Hoesly.

discussions.name: Another suggestion - Improve the "number of notifications" in the header
